attributes.action: raise the statutory maternity pay to equal the minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the statutory maternity pay currently at £123.06, we urge the government to raise it to meet its own policy regarding the minimum wage (the minimum a government expects a person to live on). on a typical full time wage, working 37 and a half hours per week, the difference amounts to £94.44 - this would make a huge difference to families who do not meet the working tax credits criteria
